item.description:
Join the best Fashion Industry Meetup in the world as we celebrate the holidays in style.

Enjoy light refreshments as you converse, connect, and network with fellow fashion entrepreneurs.

We encourage you to bring examples of your work, a positive attitude, enthusiasm, and the willingness to have fun.

You will note that we have a new meeting place. Bay State College has graciously offered to host our meetup events and we deeply appreciate it.

Look forward to seeing you all there.

Boston Fashion Industry Meetup organizers
Shirley, Ron, Jamall, Constance, Prithi, Tom, & Evan.
item.how_to_find_us: We will greet you. Make sure you RSVP Yes so that we know you are coming.
item.name: Boston Fashion Industry Meetup Group Holiday Party
